Comment.Text: VRPN The button Server tells the handball application in which step the experiment is. It also triggers the instructions given to the user. The Analog Server provides the feedback value computed by the classifier (distance to LDA hyperplan).
Please note that the feedback is starting near 40'

Overview This scenario allows to quickly replay an online session recorded file, and watch the corresponding feedback using the openvibe-vr-demo-handball. This scenario is based on motor-imagery-bci-4-replay, which can be found in bci/motor-imagery. It uses VRPN servers to communicate with the handball application. Note: refer to scenario motor-imagery-3-online for details about the processing.

The Classifier Processor is classifying the mental activity in 2 classes : Left or Right hand movements. This LDA classifier is already trained. Please refer to scenario motor-imagery-bci-2-classifier-trainer for details about the training process.
You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1
